source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_00<tab>Wandering Breeze has a recurring gigas problem he would like you to solve.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_00<tab>「聖コイナク財団の調査地」のワンダリング・ブリーズは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるらしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_01<tab>According to Wandering Breeze, the gigas who recently met their end at your hands may not have been quite the mindless brutes you took them for. Like a good historian─or a tactician─Wandering Breeze wants to study the threat. Slay four gigas and search their remains for items of interest.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_01<tab>ワンダリング・ブリーズは、ギガース族の生態や習性を研究したいらしい。「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2028701 /var>」、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2028601 /var>」、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2028801 /var>」たちを計4体討伐して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877A01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_02<tab>You find a jagged piece of crystal on each of the gigas, the only things out of place among their effects. The crystals seem to be carved in some fashion, but analyzing them is well beyond your area of expertise. Perhaps Wandering Breeze will have better luck.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877A01 /var>を入手した。「聖コイナク財団の調査地」の「ワンダリング・ブリーズ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_03<tab>Wandering Breeze theorizes that the gigas consider the Crystal Tower a holy place, and seek to claim it for themselves. Place the carved likeness of the Tower on the chosen spot, and see what happens.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_03<tab>ギガース族は「クリスタルタワー」を聖地と考え、進出してきたという。<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8D2401 /var>に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E883301 /var>」を置き、ギガース族の反応を見よう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_04<tab>Being a mite fuzzy on what a scientific observation entails, you slay the gigas who comes to retrieve the crystal. The dead giant carries with him a detailed sketch of the Crystal Tower. Curious indeed. Hand it to Wandering Breeze and see what he says.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_04<tab>現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207D601 /var>」を倒し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87D501 /var>」を入手した。「聖コイナク財団の調査地」の「ワンダリング・ブリーズ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_05<tab>The drawing turns out to be from the documents stolen from the Sons of Saint Coinach. Do these fell creatures also burn to discover the secret of the Crystal Tower? If so, they may be an even greater threat than was supposed...
target: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2028701 /var>が資料に目を通した形跡が見つかった。魔物である彼らも「クリスタルタワー」の謎を解き明かしたいのだろうか……。
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_TODO_00<tab>ギガース族から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877A01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_TODO_01<tab>Give the crystals to Wandering Breeze.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_TODO_01<tab>ワンダリング・ブリーズに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877A01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_TODO_02<tab>Place the likeness of the Crystal Tower in a likely spot.
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_TODO_03<tab>Give the document to Wandering Breeze.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_TODO_03<tab>ワンダリング・ブリーズに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E87D501 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_000<tab>It would seem our trouble with the gigas outlives the troublemakers themselves. The creatures stole some research documents, of all things.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_000先ほどの調査隊なのだが、
どうやらギガース族どもに襲われたときに、
調査資料を奪われてしまっていたらしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_001<tab>We may have underestimated them. Why would they steal such a thing? What hidden aspects do they have? We must know more of their ways.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_001なぜ、ギガース族に調査資料を奪う必要があったのか……
調査員たちの安全、そして円滑な調査活動のためにも、
奴らの文化や行動原理を探らねばなるまい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_002<tab>Since observation is out of the question, we must collect artifacts. Thaliak's Razor dictates that we go straight to the source: gigas. Your task is to slay four of them and collect anything of interest upon their persons.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_002ギガース族を4体ほど討伐して、
彼らの持ち物を持ってきてもらえないだろうか。

TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_DUMMY_000_010「」を討伐。4体くらい
→倒すと「」を4つゲット

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_020<tab>You return, and I see you have not been idle. Did you find anything of note?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_020……どうだった？
何か奴らを知ることができる研究材料は、手に入ったか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_030<tab>What's this? Pieces of crystal? I don't understand why you would─ Oh...they are all carved to some degree. Interesting. They each have a certain statuesque quality to them.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_030……ふむ、なんの変哲もないクリスタルのようだが……
いや、こっちに人為的に削った形跡があるぞ。
……すると、これは何かの彫像か？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_031<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> one, in particular, is recognizable. It is crude, but this likeness is of the Crystal Tower. I cannot see a gigas taking the time to shape such a thing solely for amusement.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_031なるほどな、この形状からすると、
「クリスタルタワー」を模したものに違いない。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_032<tab>Ah! I had almost forgotten, but there was a report two moons ago from another party molested by gigas. They, too, encountered such a crystal. And from their studies of it, they made out two words: “holy place.”
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_032……ギガース族が「聖地がどうの」と叫んでいた、
という目撃情報があったのだが……合点がいったぞ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_033<tab>The gigas may venerate the Crystal Tower. This may explain their migration following the Calamity, as well...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_033奴らは、クリスタルタワーを聖地として崇めているのだろう。
それならば、霊災後の大移動も理解できる。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_034<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, will you observe the gigas from a place well hid, after placing this likeness in plain sight? We naturalists lack the necessary training to risk such an observation, but I have every confidence you will remain undetected.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_034君、この「」を、
奴らの出現しそうな場所に設置し、様子を見てくれないか。
おそらく、それで奴らの文化を垣間見れるはずだ。

TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_DUMMYTODO_000_040「」を「指定地点」に使う
→「」1体がポップ。倒す。
→倒すと「」ゲット

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_050<tab>You observed them? What I would not give to have been there! What manner of things did you see?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_050……どうだった？
奴らは何か、興味深い行動を見せたか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_060<tab>This is from the documents reported lost to the gigas. We had thought it had been carried off pell-mell, but you say one who looked the chief among them had it?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_060……これは、前回の襲撃時に紛失したとの報告があった、
「」ではないか。
なるほど、親玉らしきギガース族が持っていたと。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_061<tab>He tore a sketch of the Crystal Tower from the records, and kept it as a precious thing. We must conclude that the Tower is indeed holy to them.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_061こうして調査記録から、
クリスタルタワーの模写図を破り、保管していたとなると……
巨塔を「聖地」と考えているのは間違いないな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_062<tab>Gigas have been known to lead other giantkind, for they have the cleverness for it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_062……ギガース族は、巨人族の中でも比較的知恵があり、
支配者階級にあたるといわれている。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_063<tab>If they can lead, they can create an army. If they can worship, they can start a crusade...or so history tells us. These are matters we must be mindful of. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, for risking much for this knowledge.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC507_00995_WANDERINGBREEZE_000_063知恵が回るぶん、普通の魔物以上に手ごわい存在だ。
この先の調査でも十分に気をつけねばなるまい。
ありがとう、冒険者。いろいろと助かったぞ。
